items.text:
It's common to use scroller objects
in conjunction with a fling gesture, but they
can be used in pretty much any context where you want the UI to display
scrolling in response to a touch event.
items.href: Animate a scroll gesture  |  Android Developers

items.text:
For example, you could override
onTouchEvent() to process touch
events directly, and produce a scrolling effect or a "snapping to page" animation
in response to those touch events.
items.href: Animate a scroll gesture  |  Android Developers
